prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Synth Pad, Piano, Strings, Pipe, Drums, Guitar, but without Bass.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features a combination of Synth Pad, Piano, Strings, Pipe, Drums, and Guitar, but without the Bass.
